name: Diwali
description: The festival of lights, symbolizing the victory of light over darkness and good over evil.

name: Holi
description: The festival of colors, celebrating the arrival of spring and the triumph of good over evil.

name: Navaratri
description: A nine-night festival dedicated to the worship of the Goddess Durga in her various forms.

name: Maha Shivaratri
description: The great night of Shiva, a solemn festival marking the remembrance of overcoming darkness and ignorance.
